Uses of Interface
com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api.ColumnMetadata

    • Uses of ColumnMetadata in com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api

      Classes in com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api that implement ColumnMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ColumnMetadataImpl
      Implementation of ColumnMetadata with setters.
      Methods in com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api that return ColumnMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnMetadata Link.getColumn(int columnIndex)
      Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given position of the column.
      ColumnMetadata Link.getColumn(String columnName)
      Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given name of the column.
      Methods in com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api that return types with arguments of type ColumnMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ColumnMetadata> Processor.getAdditionalOutputColumns(Link outputLink, List<Link> inputLinks, Properties stageProperties)
      Implementation returns a set of columns to add to the outputLink.
      List<ColumnMetadata> Link.getColumnMetadata()
      Retrieves an ordered list of column metadata
      List<ColumnMetadata> Processor.getColumnMetadataForInput(Link inputLink)
      Implementation returns a set of ColumnMetadata objects corresponding to a given inputLink.
      List<ColumnMetadata> Processor.getColumnMetadataForOutput(Link outputLink)
      Implementation returns a set of ColumnMetadata objects corresponding to a given outputLink.
      List<ColumnMetadata> Link.subtractColumnList(Link link)
      Retrieves a list of column metadata that are in this link but not in the specified link.
